calibrate_probe_high.docs:
The pH probe have to be calibrated. For this you need know the pH reference value and temperature of the calibration high solution.

*See also: [`ufire_ise.calibrate_probe_high` Action](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ufire_ise.html#ufire-ise-calibrate-probe-high-action)*

calibrate_probe_low.docs:
The pH probe have to be calibrated. For this you need know the pH reference value and temperature of the calibration low solution.

*See also: [`ufire_ise.calibrate_probe_low` Action](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ufire_ise.html#ufire-ise-calibrate-probe-low-action)*

reset.docs:
Reset the current calibration on the sensor.

*See also: [`ufire_ise.reset` Action](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ufire_ise.html#ufire-ise-reset-action)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The ID of the ufire pH sensor.

*See also: [uFire ISE pH sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ufire_ise.html#ufire-ise-reset-action)*

address.docs:
**, int**: Specify the I²C address of the sensor. Defaults to `0x3f`.

*See also: [uFire ISE pH sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ufire_ise.html#configuration-variables)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Set the ID of this sensor for use in lambdas.

*See also: [uFire ISE pH sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ufire_ise.html#configuration-variables)*

ph.docs:
**, [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor)**: Set the pH sensor configuration. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [uFire ISE pH sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ufire_ise.html#configuration-variables)*

temperature.docs:
**, [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor)**: Set the onboard temperature sensor configuration. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor). Can’t be used together with `temperature_sensor`.

*See also: [uFire ISE pH sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ufire_ise.html#configuration-variables)*

temperature_sensor.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Set the ID of the temperature sensor. Only needed if the onboard temperature sensor is not used.

*See also: [uFire ISE pH sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ufire_ise.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**, [Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.

*See also: [uFire ISE pH sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ufire_ise.html#configuration-variables)*

*See also: [uFire ISE pH sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/ufire_ise.html#ufire-ise-calibrate-probe-low-action)*

solution.docs:
